website_summaries.verdict: A handsome piece of furniture with an integrated bookcase headboard and generous under-bed storage.
pros: The headboard cubbyholes hold books, personal items, and electronics, with a discreet hole for cords
The 10 integrated drawers — 2 at the head and 8 under the bed — glide smoothly
cons: Some owners may struggle with the height
The bed is made from a mixture of engineered and solid wood, but still boasts a sturdy construction

customer_reviews.title: The instructions could have had better pictures. As it was
customer_reviews.text: The bed was not too hard to assemble. The instructions could have had better pictures. As it was, I overlooked the long and short trestle bars and accused the company of the parts being missing. The company was prompt in sending me the 'missing parts' and as I continued to assemble the bed, found the 'missing parts' mixed in with the bed slats. They were of the same color and about the same length and width. My mistake. The bed is very solid, it looks great. Very satisfied. Just embarrassed for the hard time I gave the company over the 'missing' parts . . . . David Adams Mobile, Alabama
customer_reviews.author: David Adams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well built bed
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got us this for our one year anniversary. The best gift I have ever recieved as I have always wanted a captain's bed. It is built well, with real wood. Stained and perfect looking just like the photos. We were not missing any parts, had no issues putting it together except for the support beam that the directions weren't super clear on, but we figured it out and it has held up well. The bed is high, so a mattress that is on the thin side would be best, no box spring. It looks great, is sturdy and we are very happy with the purchase and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Clifton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: So many parts came broken, attaching several pictures, so you guys can see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but expected more
customer_reviews.text: The bed although appears nice I had expected things to be made of higher quality materials for such a price. Parts were missing when shipped and took nearly a month to get replacements. I had concerns about the included slats for the mattress support being so thin I replaced them with thicker boards. For some of the positives, I do like the headboard and the storage for books and things. The design is very nice. Be sure to build it in place where you plan Not to move it. This bed will not move easily and if slid across the floor will most likely break.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, some build alteration may be required
customer_reviews.text: Really like the final product but it did have some assembly issues. In general the instructions are good enough but for some parts were wrong. The main issue was with the center rail (part 8). The holes were drilled in the wrong spots so the distance between parts 9 didn't not fit properly in step 7. Also part 8 had two sets of holes with anchors for the screws on set large, the other small (for the C and B bolts). They were flipped so they didn't align with the roll slats in step 8. I had to flip the anchors and also drill another hole for the proper distance to make make it all work for part 8.
customer_reviews.author: spacetimeflux

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy. It did take a few hours
customer_reviews.text: Product came in three large boxes. Boxes were strong and well packed. Headboard and drawers were already assembled except for the drawer knobs. The bed has a total of 10 drawers. Two each side, four at foot, and two small drawers in headboard. Only philips screwdriver and allen wrench are needed for assembly. The allen wrench was included. Assembly was easy. It did take a few hours. Unpacking the boxes was a fair amount of the time. The bed is well made with a good finish. Very good quality drawers with smooth metal rollers. Nice opening in headboard for power for a clock or light. I was very impressed with the product and would buy again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.

customer_reviews.title: Thisbed is really high and sturdy. I purchased a queen size
customer_reviews.text: Thisbed is really high and sturdy. I purchased a queen size, thinking it should be fine, but since the bed is very high, you kind of want to sleep further from the edges. Therefore it has been tricky for me and my husband to fit into a queen size. Would have purchased a king if I knew.

customer_reviews.title: One happy customer!

The bed arrived in 3 boxes with some damage to the outside cardboard boxes, but it was well protected by the packing which kept the bed from being damaged in any way. The bed is beautiful and well made. I was so happy with it, I bought the matching tall dresser and nightstands. I am equally impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Books

customer_reviews.title: Great for small Apartments!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bed! It's easy to assemble and disassemble. It looks great, although I do wish it came in a light wood color as well... Other nice things about this bed include: lots of under bed storage, great stability, and the fact that it has metal thread devices that the securing screws go into, make this bed long lasting, even through multiple re-assemblies! Unfortunately, the first time I purchased this bed, was through a furniture store and I paid $1200 for it. Then I found out a couple years later about Amazon's amazing low price! So beware, this IS the same exact bed you will find in a store, however much cheaper and free delivery on Amazon!

I put a 14 inch memory foam mattress and a 4 inch memory foam topper on it, so 18 inches total, and the top of the mattress is about even with the bottom of my bra strap when standing next to the bed in flat feet.

I would have preferred that it was all bolts and nuts so it could be taken apart easy. Screwing certain sections in makes reassembly more of a hassle .Also slats are not wide enough to hold a tempurpedic mattress, I put two sheets of plywood in its place.

customer_reviews.title: It took my husband a couple hours to put together and according to him was not bad at all

customer_reviews.title: Great bed. Solid
customer_reviews.text: Great bed. Solid, heavy, beautiful piece of furniture! However, ensure if you order from Furniture Creations that you unpack and inspect every piece delivered by the deliverer before signing. DO NOT sign the shipping paper, if you identify any issues. Have the shipping company load the furniture back on the truck and take it with them. Otherwise you're either stuck with the damaged furniture or you'll have to repurchase the item. Furniture Creations takes NO responsibility for their product once you sign the shipping document...! Photos and statements from the shipper doesn't equate to any favorable results for you, if you sign the shipping documents...just saying...!
